item.title: Show HN：WAFI - 以太坊钱包经理（生成检查编辑钱包）
item.description:
文字： Hi HN!I’ve been building a small desktop tool to manage Ethereum wallets more easily — no browser extensions, no web apps, just a native Windows program.WaFi helps you:Generate up to 1,000,000 ETH wallets (private key + address)Store them in a local SQLite database (wallets.db)View/edit wallet records with pagination and searchCheck balances using the Etherscan API（仅零）可以免费尝试（7天试用），并通过电报bot 激活许可证
注释url： https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=436396613 点：1 ＃评论：0
